metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7884 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
The vivid_fb_ioctl function in drivers/media/platform/vivid/vivid-osd.c inthe Linux kernel through 4.3.3 does not initialize a certain structuremember, which allows local users to obtain sensitive information fromkernel memory via a crafted application.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7884` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
